clip.quote: You don't have to be the smartest person in the room. You just have to outwork the smartest person in the room.
clip.why_clipworthy: This quote encapsulates a powerful mindset that can inspire agents to push beyond their limits.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to know the secret to success in real estate? It's simpler than you think.

clip.quote: It's an honor to be chosen by clients, and I treat them like they're an honor.
clip.why_clipworthy: This statement highlights the importance of valuing clients, which can resonate deeply with viewers.
clip.suggested_hook: Here's why treating every client like an honor can transform your business.
